channel.title: SharePoint 2010 on Joost's blog
channel.description: Recent content in SharePoint 2010 on Joost's blog

item.title: Localized resource for token ‘Direction’ could not be found
item.description: You have created a neat SharePoint feature that works great. But in the logs files several errors pop up as soon as you deploy the new feature, complaining about a Localized resource token ‘Direction’.

item.title: Modify the groups listed when granting permissions to a site
item.description: When you click the button ‘Grant Permissions’ in the Permission screen of a site you always get the option to insert a user inside a SharePoint group.
